segments.text: Your office called and said that the owners had made a counter-offer to my offer to purchase their house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To your offer of three hundred and twenty thousand dollars , the owners have counter-offered three hundred and thirty-five thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that maybe I should accept their offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You , of course , have two ways of responding . You can say yes or come up with another offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to make another offer , but I am afraid that they will decline and I will lose this house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is always a chance that someone could outbid you , but you could try one more offer if you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would now like to offer three hundred and thirty thousand dollars as a counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After the owners get home from work tonight , I will approach them with your offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me how long it will take them to get back to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don â€™ t think that it will take as long as the response to the first offer .
segments.speaker: S2
